body:
Comment 2 by **catalinp@google.com**: 
The interface of HTTPError has been changing a lot recently:
http://bugs.python.org/issue13211

In my version of urllib2.py, self.reason is a property so can't be assigned to. It's
just an alias for self.msg, though, so it might be feasible to just assign to self.msg
instead (this seems to work for me on Python 2.7.3).
